content: I need help implementing a new API endpoint for user authentication. Can you build the code?
@forge Can you implement a REST API endpoint for user login?
@forge Please build an Express API endpoint for user login
@forge Please create a simple Express API endpoint for user registration
@forge Test: Can you respond using GPT-5.2?
@forge Build me a simple Express route for GET /api/users that returns a JSON array
@forge Build me a simple Express route for GET /api/users that returns a JSON array
